about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a passionate full stack software developer focused on creating efficient and innovative digital solutions. I have experience working with modern web technologies in both frontend and backend, plus knowledge in infrastructure, databases, and cloud deployment. I stand out for my ability to solve problems practically, learn quickly, and adapt to different technological environments, always with a focus on delivering quality and scalable products.
about.funFact1: I started coding at age 15 with Unity game development
about.funFact2: I've participated in multiple game jams and hackathons
about.funFact3: I speak three languages: Spanish, English, and C# ðŸ˜‰

juntea.title: Juntea - Events App
juntea.description: Mobile application for event management developed with Flutter and Dart. Allows users to create, manage, and participate in events intuitively. Features registration, event calendar, push notifications, and attendee management with a native mobile experience.

chapiri.title: Chapiri Academy
chapiri.description: Modern educational platform for Chapiri Academy. Designed with a focus on student experience, offering course management, interactive educational resources, and progress tracking. Features an admin panel for teachers, class scheduling, and downloadable materials.

goblinAttack.title: Goblin Attack
goblinAttack.description: An exciting Tower Defense game developed with Unity 3D and C#. Players must defend their castle from waves of goblins by strategically building towers. Includes multiple levels, different enemy types, and towers with unique abilities.

webPresentation.title: School Website
webPresentation.description: A modern website for Technical School No. 1 of Merlo, with an interactive presentation of the institution. Includes information about technical careers, image gallery, contact forms, and responsive design optimized for all devices.

portfolio.title: Personal Portfolio
portfolio.description: My personal portfolio developed with React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. Features Framer Motion animations, interactive AI terminal, dynamic theme system, and fully responsive design. A showcase of my modern frontend development skills.

nuevoMundo.title: New World E-commerce
nuevoMundo.description: Full-stack e-commerce platform developed with React, Node.js, and MongoDB. Includes product catalog, shopping cart, payment system, admin panel, and responsive design. A complete solution for online sales with optimized user experience.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: Have a question or want to work together? Feel free to send me a message!
